Phase
NOW
rows.col_2: An 893-tab spreadsheet. Internal tool. Nilo + Claude.
rows.col_3: Nilo only. PM co-founders when hired.

rows.TRADE EVOLUTION MODEL: PHASE 1: SERIES
rows.col_2: The Trade + MC conversations + daily updates = a live docuseries of a company being built.
rows.col_5: Consumer-grade site wrapping the Trade content. Videos make it accessible.

rows.TRADE EVOLUTION MODEL: PHASE 2: FUNDED
rows.col_2: IonWave is funded. Trade is the operating system. Every model is a live project with a PM co-founder.
rows.col_3: Full IonWave team. Investors tracking progress.
rows.col_5: Every model verified by experts. Production-grade documentation.

rows.TRADE EVOLUTION MODEL: PHASE 3: TEXTBOOK
rows.col_2: The Trade becomes a published reference. "How to Launch a D2C Brand: The Complete Operating Model."
rows.col_5: Edited, designed, ISBN. Each model is a chapter. MC conversations become case studies.

rows.TRADE EVOLUTION MODEL: PHASE 4: PRODUCT
rows.col_2: The Trade becomes a SaaS tool. "Build your own Trade." Claude-powered operating model generator.
rows.col_4: SaaS revenue. The infrastructure company's core product.
rows.col_5: Interactive. AI-powered. Custom Trades per business.

rows.TRADE EVOLUTION MODEL: PHASE 5: NETWORK
rows.col_2: Multiple Trades for multiple businesses. The coordination hedgefund at scale.
rows.col_3: Portfolio company operators, investors, the market.
rows.col_5: Enterprise-grade. The Trade is the operating system of the infrastructure company.

rows.TRADE EVOLUTION MODEL: STUDIO = BUSINESS SOPHISTICATION
Right now S1-S3 (studio models) are lighter than M0-M40 (business models).
This is wrong. The studio IS the product for the infrastructure company.
If the studio models aren't as sophisticated as M33 (Governance) or M27 (Research),
then the infrastructure company has nothing to sell.
What needs to happen:
• S1 (Production) needs the same depth as any M- model. How does the AI loop work?
What are the quality standards? What does the expert calibration process look like in detail?
• S2 (Labor) needs complete role engineering. Every role, every funnel, every contract template.
The recruiting funnel, the career booster framework, the onboarding UX — all in S2.
• S3 (Infrastructure) needs the full financial model, entity structure, and thesis for the
infrastructure company. Not just IonWave. The holding company. The fund. The SaaS.
The studio models should have MORE tabs than the average business model, not fewer.
Because the studio IS the innovation. IonWave is the proof. The studio is the product.
